page.title: 13W.CHILTINGTON MEDIA
page.content: There are no newspapers published in W.Chilt. but local news is reported in the{W.Sussex Gazette}based in{Arundel and the{W.Sussex County Times}based in {Horsham.}There is a choice of three local{Radio Stations:BBC.Radio Sussex, and{Southern Sound}from{Brighton;Radio {Mercury}from Crawley is independent. To find out about{TV}we asked the class some questions. Half of the families had a{Video}at home and used it to record programmes and play back hired tapes. About half thought they watched TV for up to 3 hours a night. Some thought they watched for up to 7 hours.They viewed all types of program Most of the children were members of Storrington{Library,}some belonged to other Libraries. Very few did not belong at all. The boys like to read {Adventure and Horror}stories.The girls also like{Adventure}stories specially.
